history.proof: intros m x x' Hmap Hdbl. unfold double_link. split. - intro Heq. unfold double_link in Hdbl. destruct Hdbl as [Hneq Hexpe]. apply Hneq. symmetry. apply Heq. - destruct Hdbl as [Hneq Hexpe]. shelve.

ctx: intros m x x' Hmap Hdbl.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap x, x' : dart Hmap : inv_hmap m Hneq : x <> x' Hexpe : expe m x x' Unable to unify "expe m x x'" with "expe m x' x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> double_link m x' x

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
double_link = fun (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) => x <> x' /\ expe m x x' : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
planar_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> x <> x' -> planar (Br1 m x x')
Br1 = fun (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) => if succ_dec m zero x then if succ_dec m zero x' then B (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x)) zero x' else B m zero x else B m zero x' : fmap -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap_L0L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in let m2 := L (L m one x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> inv_hmap m2
nf_L0L1_VIIA : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in let m2 := L (L m one x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0 := cA_1 m zero y in let y'0 := cA m zero y' in let x'1 := cA m one x' in let y'0b := cA (L m zero x y) zero y' in let x_1b := cA_1 (L m one x' y') one x in ~ expf m x_1 y -> expf m x' y'0 -> ~ expf (L m zero x y) x' y'0b -> expf (L m one x' y') x_1b y -> x = y' -> False
nf_L0L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) one x' y' in let m2 := L (L m one x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> nf m1 = nf m2
nf_L0L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y x' y' : dart), let m1 := L (L m zero x y) zero x' y' in let m2 := L (L m zero x' y') zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> nf m1 = nf m2
expf_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> MF.expo m x y -> eqc m x y
planar_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (B m zero x)
MA0.orb_impls_expo : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> impls (MA0.Iter_orb m x) (MA0.Iter_orb m y) -> MA0.expo m x y
MA1.exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (MA1.Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
not_eqc_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m one x y)
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
MA0.incls_rem : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (MA0.Iter_rem m x) (fmap_to_set m)
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
eqc_cA_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m x (cA m k y) -> eqc m x y
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
eqc_B_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> eqc (B m k x) x (bottom m k x)
BinIntDef.Z.add = fun x y : Z => match x with | 0 => y | Z.pos x' => match y with | 0 => x | Z.pos y' => Z.pos (x' + y') | Z.neg y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub x' y' end | Z.neg x' => match y with | 0 => x | Z.pos y' => BinIntDef.Z.pos_sub y' x' | Z.neg y' => Z.neg (x' + y') end end : Z -> Z -> Z Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
eqc_cA_1_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> eqc m (cA_1 m k x) y -> eqc m x y
MA1.expo_between_3 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA1.expo1 m x y -> MA1.expo1 m x z -> MA1.between m x z y \/ MA1.between m (MA1.f m y) z (MA1.f_1 m x)
eqc_trans : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y z -> eqc m x z
nf_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> nf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) = nf m
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planar_L_B_top_bot_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x))
eqc_symm : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), eqc m x y -> eqc m y x
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
eqc_B_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) (A m k x) (top m k x)
expf_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> expf (I m x u p) z t < -> expf m z t
inv_hmap_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x))
B_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> B_1 m k x = B m k (A_1 m k x)
expf_refl : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> expf m z z
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
disconnect_planar_criterion_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in expf m y x0 < -> ~ eqc (B m zero x) x y
expf_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> expf (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x)) z t < -> expf m z t
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
MA1.upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MA1.Iter_upb m z = MA1.degree m z
MF.upb_eq_degree : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> MF.Iter_upb m z = MF.degree m z
MA0.expo_exd : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> MA0.expo m z t -> exd m t

```  
intros m x x' Hmap Hdbl.
unfold double_link.
split.
- intro Heq.
  unfold double_link in Hdbl.
  destruct Hdbl as [Hneq Hexpe].
  apply Hneq.
  symmetry.
  apply Heq.
- destruct Hdbl as [Hneq Hexpe].
  exact Hexpe.
```
